page.title: 16CLUBS IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: The area sustains about 46 organisations broadly in 3 categories as below. Many carry out considerable charity fund raising. VOLUNTARY Boy and Cub Scouts, Girl Guides and Brownies, Boy's and Girl's Brigades and Red Cross are well represented as are the Civic Trust, Lions and Young Farmers. SOCIAL Two large social clubs with permanent premises provide alcohol and facilities for billiards, darts etc. For those aged over 60 there two groups and there is a branch of the British Legion. Youth have 2 clubs. There are many clubs exclusively for women. SPORTS/HOBBIES Football, cricket, tennis, badminton, bowls and angling are well catered for. Other activities include chess, bell ringing photography, wine making and drama.
